n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>%USER_NAME%</SCHEMA> <NAME>V_F1_SEASON</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>SEASON</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>INFO</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select to_number(f1.season) as season ,f1.info from f1_staging.v_f1_json_docs ftab, json_table(ftab.f1_document,'$.MRData.SeasonTable.Seasons[*]' COLUMNS ( season PATH '$.season', info PATH '$.url') ) f1 where ftab.doc_type = 'SEASONS' order by to_number(f1.season)</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
